trans-unit.source: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_USER_ACCESS</codeph> function returns the current connection access permission for the user specified.

seg-source.mrk: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_USER_ACCESS</codeph> function returns the current connection access permission for the user specified.

target.mrk: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_USER_ACCESS</codeph> function returns the current connection access permission for the user specified.

trans-unit.source: If no permission is explicitly set for the user, the access permission for the user is the value of the default connection mode. The default connection mode is set by using the <codeph><xref href="rrefproper24846.dita#rrefproper24846">derby.database.defaultConnectionMode</xref></codeph> property.

seg-source.mrk: If no permission is explicitly set for the user, the access permission for the user is the value of the default connection mode.
The default connection mode is set by using the <codeph><xref href="rrefproper24846.dita#rrefproper24846">derby.database.defaultConnectionMode</xref></codeph> property.

target.mrk: If no permission is explicitly set for the user, the access permission for the user is the value of the default connection mode.
The default connection mode is set by using the <codeph><xref href="rrefproper24846.dita#rrefproper24846">derby.database.defaultConnectionMode</xref></codeph> property.

trans-unit.source: An input argument of type VARCHAR(128) that specifies the user ID in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database.

seg-source.mrk: An input argument of type VARCHAR(128) that specifies the user ID in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database.

target.mrk: An input argument of type VARCHAR(128) that specifies the user ID in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database.

trans-unit.source: The value that is returned by this function is either <codeph>fullAccess</codeph>, <codeph>readOnlyAccess</codeph>, or <codeph>noAccess</codeph>.

seg-source.mrk: The value that is returned by this function is either <codeph>fullAccess</codeph>, <codeph>readOnlyAccess</codeph>, or <codeph>noAccess</codeph>.

target.mrk: The value that is returned by this function is either <codeph>fullAccess</codeph>, <codeph>readOnlyAccess</codeph>, or <codeph>noAccess</codeph>.

trans-unit.source: A return value of <codeph>noAccess</codeph> means that the connection attempt by the user will be denied because neither the <codeph><xref href="rrefproper25025.dita#rrefproper25025">derby.database.fullAccessUsers</xref></codeph> property nor the <codeph><xref href="rrefproper39325.dita#rrefproper39325">derby.database.readOnlyAccessUsers</xref></codeph> property is set for the user, and the <codeph>derby.database.defaultConnectionMode</codeph> property is set to <codeph>noAccess</codeph>.

seg-source.mrk: A return value of <codeph>noAccess</codeph> means that the connection attempt by the user will be denied because neither the <codeph><xref href="rrefproper25025.dita#rrefproper25025">derby.database.fullAccessUsers</xref></codeph> property nor the <codeph><xref href="rrefproper39325.dita#rrefproper39325">derby.database.readOnlyAccessUsers</xref></codeph> property is set for the user, and the <codeph>derby.database.defaultConnectionMode</codeph> property is set to <codeph>noAccess</codeph>.

target.mrk: A return value of <codeph>noAccess</codeph> means that the connection attempt by the user will be denied because neither the <codeph><xref href="rrefproper25025.dita#rrefproper25025">derby.database.fullAccessUsers</xref></codeph> property nor the <codeph><xref href="rrefproper39325.dita#rrefproper39325">derby.database.readOnlyAccessUsers</xref></codeph> property is set for the user, and the <codeph>derby.database.defaultConnectionMode</codeph> property is set to <codeph>noAccess</codeph>.

trans-unit.source: The names of the connection permissions match the existing names in use by <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: The names of the connection permissions match the existing names in use by <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

target.mrk: The names of the connection permissions match the existing names in use by <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this function by default. See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information. The database owner can grant access to other users.

seg-source.mrk: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this function by default.
See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.
The database owner can grant access to other users.

target.mrk: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this function by default.
See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.
The database owner can grant access to other users.
